climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: HIGH-QUALITY - Ensures durability through strong stitching and is manufactured using high-quality filling

BOX STYLE STITCHING - Crisp looking comforter featuring Piped Edges with an elegant Box Style Stitching Pattern that not only looks beautiful, but prevents the fill from shifting during the night, ensuring a comfortable sleep
SOFT & COMFORTABLE - Made using soft material with siliconized fiber filling that provides a comfy and cozy feel throughout the night
CONVENIENT SIZE - Full/Queen comforter measures 88 inches by 88 inches
MACHINE WASHABLE - Machine wash in gentle cycle with cold water, sun-dry or tumble dry on low when needed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price, great value, great comfort
reviews.reviewText: We needed a new comforter for our Cal King bed this winter. Ordered one that was advertised at $39.00. It was too light to keep us warm. Ordered a heavier comforter for $80.00. It kept us warm but had a Polyester outer shell that bothered my wife's allergies. Tried a 3rd time. We bought the Utopia Bedding Comforter with a $30 discount coupon. It's has a a Feather Down fill with box stitching and a cotton outer shell. Perfect. A great deal and a great price. I would recommend this comforter. Don S.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You need to buy this!
reviews.reviewText: I like to wrap myself in my blanket, and I end up taking the covers from my husband. For the last few years, I have a small twin blanket and bed blanket is my husbands (that also goes over me and my blanket). With this blanket, I can move all I want AND wrap myself up in this blanket and it doesn't bother my husband at all. ALSO!! This is such a great blanket. It is super light weight, but nice and warm. It is so soft, it is almost too hard to get out of bed in the morning because how happy I am with the blanket. I know it sounds crazy, but it is the best blanket I have ever owned. I love it so much that I just bought a queen size blanket for our bed so my husband can enjoy the blanket love as well. Hope this help you make your choice. I got the dark grey for my blanket and the bed blanket. LOVE

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love how fluffy it is. It adds warmth and weight, and is so wonderful to curl up under. I got the king size when we have a queen bed so I always have enough covers on me. I like the black, because bright colors wake me up. It's wonderful. I can't say enough how much I like this comforter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Bedding All Season 250 GSM Comforter has proven to be a versatile and cozy addition to my bedding ensemble, providing comfort and warmth throughout the year.The 250 GSM (grams per square meter) fill weight strikes a balance that makes it suitable for all seasons. It offers enough warmth to keep me comfortable during colder months without causing overheating during warmer weather. This adaptability ensures that I can use the comforter year-round, making it a practical and cost-effective choice.The microfiber shell adds to the overall comfort of the comforter. It's soft to the touch and provides a smooth and pleasant sleeping experience. The microfiber material is also hypoallergenic, making it a suitable option for those with allergies or sensitivities.The box-stitch construction is a standout feature, preventing the fill from shifting and ensuring even distribution throughout the comforter. This design not only enhances the comforter's durability but also maintains a consistent level of warmth across the entire surface.The all-season comforter is machine washable, adding to its convenience and ease of care. The durable construction and quality materials mean that it holds up well to regular washing, maintaining its fluffiness and overall performance.One standout experience was during a chilly winter night. The Bedding All Season Comforter provided the right amount of warmth without the need for additional blankets, creating a cozy and inviting sleep environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and warm- so comfortable!!
reviews.reviewText: Great price. Length is great and the comforter is so soft and warm . Great buy. Very happy with it. Helps me fall asleep easier with how comfortable it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight But Cozy & Warm On The Coldest Night Of The Year
reviews.reviewText: It’s like sleeping with a cloud covering you, it isn’t super puffy, but it is light and cozy. Very soft. You could tie two together if you wanted extra thickness.The ties are super useful for holding it inside a duvet cover. I’m delighted with this purchase. I bought it to go inside a duvet cover, as a king comforter won’t fit in the washing machine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than I thought it would be! Excellent!
reviews.reviewText: I love this comforter. It is very warm and it really keeps the heat in. It is lightweight though. I'm really glad I purchased this. It is very soft and just over all great. It does have a loop at each end maybe that is so that if you have a cover you want to put over it. A very good purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent but not soft
reviews.reviewText: Good value for the money. It’s smooth like a plastic bottle is smooth, but it’s not soft. I bought a soft duvet cover for it.It’s lightweight and a good low warmth comforter. Good in slightly cool rooms like in A/C or spring time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Utopia Bedding All Season Comforter - Cozy, Soft, and Versatile for Year-Round Comfort
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired the Utopia Bedding All Season Comforter in Twin size, and it has quickly become a staple for my bedding. This plush and ultra-soft down alternative comforter offers a delightful sleeping experience, thanks to its siliconized fiberfill and box-stitched design. Here's why I highly recommend the Utopia Bedding All Season Comforter for those seeking year-round comfort and quality sleep:Plush Siliconized Fiberfill:The comforter's siliconized fiberfill provides a luxurious and plush feel, mimicking the coziness of down without the use of animal products. The softness of the fill ensures a comfortable and inviting sleeping environment.All Season Versatility:True to its name, the Utopia Bedding Comforter is designed for all-season use. Its medium weight strikes the perfect balance, providing warmth in cooler months while remaining breathable enough for comfortable use during warmer seasons. This versatility makes it an excellent choice for year-round comfort.Box Stitched Design:The box-stitched design serves a dual purpose. Not only does it add a touch of elegance to the comforter, but it also prevents the fill from shifting or clumping. This ensures consistent and even distribution of warmth throughout the comforter, promoting a comfortable sleep experience.Ultra-Soft Microfiber Cover:The microfiber cover of the comforter is exceptionally soft to the touch. The smooth and gentle fabric enhances the overall comfort, making it a pleasure to snuggle into bed. The microfiber cover is also durable and resistant to wrinkles, maintaining a neat and inviting appearance.Easy to Care for:Maintaining the Utopia Bedding Comforter is a breeze. It is machine washable, allowing for convenient cleaning and care. The durable construction ensures that the comforter retains its quality even after repeated washes, making it a practical choice for everyday use.Twin Size Ideal for Various Beds:The Twin size is versatile and suitable for various bed setups, including twin beds, bunk beds, and daybeds. Its dimensions make it easy to layer with other bedding or use as a standalone comforter.White Color for Timeless Elegance:The classic white color of the comforter adds a timeless and elegant touch to any bedroom decor. It complements a wide range of color schemes and bedding styles, allowing for easy integration into your existing bedroom aesthetics.Budget-Friendly Comfort:One of the standout features of the Utopia Bedding Comforter is its affordability without compromising on quality. It provides a budget-friendly option for those seeking a cozy and reliable bedding solution.In summary, the Utopia Bedding All Season Comforter in Twin size delivers on its promise of comfort, versatility, and affordability. Whether you're looking for a cozy companion for chilly nights or a breathable option for warmer seasons, this comforter proves to be a reliable choice. I highly recommend the Utopia Bedding All Season Comforter for its plush feel, thoughtful design, and all-encompassing comfort.

ME ENCANTA! llevo meses con el y no puedo ser más feliz, es suave, facil de lavar, muy calido, me encanta dormir con el. Lo que recomiendo es comprar una talla más a tu cama para que cuelgue, yo tengo una matrimonial y quedo perfecto el tamaño queen:)
Es súper calientito. No es pesado, pero si hace bulto, o sea que tu cama se va a ver esponjosa.Lo único que cambiaría, es que lo pediría una talla más grande para que no quede tan justo.

Very warm. Thin and comfortable. Has spots to attach into a duvet cover. This is NOT a duvet though… a comforter.Update: after using this for a bit I find this extremely warm! I cannot get over how warm it keeps you for being such a light comforter. Go purchase one now while they are at a good price because you will not be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Well made duvet. If you’re intending to put it in a cover be aware it moves and doesn’t stay flat in the cover. I should have taken notice of previous reviews. I wouldn’t recommend
